        返回:

      • delCourse

        public boolean delCourse(java.lang.String NO)
        delete a course by its NO
        参数:

        返回:
        if successfully delete,return true

      • updateCourse

        public boolean updateCourse(java.lang.String NO,
                            double score)
        change a course's score by its NO
        参数:

        score - the new score of the course
        返回:
        if successfully change ,return true
